﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿
﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿[size=6][b]Welcome
[size=4]General Information[/size]
[/b][/size]Skyothic is a new version of gothic 2. At the same time skyrim and gothic in one. It have own character progress system, with atrubuts such as strength, dexterity... To learn skill, you will be need find a teacher, and spend skill points. Every level grants 5 skill points and 1 perk point. Items will have now requirements, for example a weapons will require strength and etc. And all this with a wonderful gothic story.

English is not my first language, but you do not have to worry about the quality of mod, all texts, voices come from gothic.

You probably wonder why I put / share this in the alpha version. I'm doing this mod on my own(alone) and I'm not objective, and I need your opinions.

Already done:

[size=5][b]Detailed information[/b][/size]

Almost all melee weapons will require strength.  (there will be also dexterity mele weapons)
Range weapons will require dexterity etc.
Magic staffs will have none.
I will not able to creat now armors onlny weapons, you can buy a few starting armors like leather armor, to get new armor joint to fraction one of three. Like in gothic.

There will be permanent potions, Boks, stones tablets.

To learn skill, you will be need find a teacher, and spend skill points. Every level grants 5 skill points and 1 perk point. To start can lockpick you will be need frist find teacher who will teach you this, same for blacksmith, hunting, alchemy, enchantments etc.

Health regeneration is off, also wait is off, to regen health i can sleep, eat, drink potions or use magic.
This means game will be more difficult

Magic will be onlny for mages. For normal people onlny scrolls :D.

No travel to skyrim(onlny with cheat). Maybe after the end of main story.
Horse will be available. No fast travel until 3 chapter, but there will be three lepeorts like in gothic.

No character creation, he was, hi is and will be only Nameless :P

Orcs appearance will be from skyrim.

No enemy scaling. At the beginning you will need probably run away from most of the opponents.

Everything(items in chests etc) will be added manually without random spawn.


Most things will be like in gothic. But not yet.
The description will change in the future
